settings.title: 1st AMAZING GIFT
settings.description: During the Christmas season, we will have a Black Pathfinder and Pathfinder Step-Thru Bundle available at $2,798. The original price is $3,998. You will save $1,200!

settings.title: 2nd AMAZING GIFT
settings.half_title: Discount on ALL Models Up to 30% OFF
settings.description: During the Christmas season, all ebike models of BeeCool will come with discounts. This is the last chance to get a great deal of this year!

settings.title: 3st AMAZING GIFT
settings.half_title: Buy 2 Ebikes Get Extra $150 OFF
settings.description:
Buy any 2 ebike products and get an extra $150 OFF
(Please note: Pathfinders Bundle will be counted as ONE product)

settings.title: 4th AMAZING GIFT
settings.description:
Any Returning Customers who purchased at least one BeeCool ebike Before December 4, 2022, can enjoy a $150 extra discount for re-purchase.
Send an email with your name and order to event@beecoolbikes.com to apply for the $150 coupon code.
We will verify your original order info and will send you $150 off code after we confirm your original order info. If you have re-purchase plan, please send us email in advance.

settings.title: 5th AMAZING GIFT
settings.half_title: Christmas Gifts for Any Ebike Purchase
settings.description:
You will receive a Christmas gift package from us if you purchase an ebike during the Christmas season. The Gift is worth $99.99.

The package will contain:
1 Winter Hat,
1 Pair of Winter Gloves (Touch Screen Friendly),
1 Winter Neck Gaiter,
1 Pair of Christmas Socks
1 Christmas Bag
